sub_fields.label: Split Background
sub_fields.name: split_background
sub_fields.instructions: If yes, each column may have its own background color or image. Section title is not available on split backgrounds.

sub_fields.name: column_color
sub_fields.instructions: Set the background color for the column

sub_fields.label: Column Image
sub_fields.name: column_image
sub_fields.instructions: Add an image as the column background.

sub_fields.label: CSS Class

sub_fields.instructions: Add CSS classes to this column, separated by a space.

sub_fields.label: Slide Interval
sub_fields.name: carousel_interval
sub_fields.instructions: The amount of time to delay between automatically cycling an item. If false (0), carousel will not automatically cycle.
